name: Tresurun: Tower of Fos
description:
Tresurun: Tower of Fos

How good are you at solving puzzles? Your task is to get the Stone of Fos and leave the tower. With a clock under you hand see how fast you can make your way through the machinery powered by the mysterious artefact. What's your beast time to get the treasure?

Controls

Use mouse to move around, Left mouse button to take actions. Hover over to see information about the action.

You can hold the left mouse button on the clock if you want to get a constant update about the time you take doing so and stress yourself even more.

[Alt]+[Enter] for fullscreen (Windows version).

[F] for swapping between full size and smaller size (HTML version, useful for fullscreen mode).

Roadmap
  • In the nearest future: access to main menu, some more options, and autosave if anything will break you away from the game.
  • If the game kicks in: puzzle randomisation, possibly with some setup options.
